required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Observational Study of YONDELIS®+PLD for the Treatment of Patients With Platinum-sensitive Relapse of Ovarian Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: An Observational, Multicenter, Open-label Study of YONDELIS®+PLD for the Treatment of Patients With Platinum-sensitive Relapse of Ovarian Cancer

brief_summary.textblock:
Clinical trials are, due to the inclusion and exclusion criteria, accomplished with defined patient groups, which are not representative for the whole patient population.
Especially elderly patients and patients with co-morbidities are underrepresented in clinical trials.
This non-interventional study will examine the efficiency and toxicity of the Yondelis® + PLD combination therapy in a general patient population to evaluate if the data collected in the clinical trials can be assigned to a general patient population.

detailed_description.textblock: Yondelis® (trabectedin) was approved (in combination with PLD) in the European community in December 2009 for the treatment of platinum-sensitive ovarian cancer relapse. Based on the outcomes of study OVA-301, this non-interventional study will investigate the role of a platinum-free treatment regimen in patients with progressive ovarian cancer relapsing > 6 months after completing previous platinum-based chemotherapy. In particular, this study aims at collecting the "real-life" data with regard to the response and the influence of the mentioned therapy on the "tumor related events", to objectify the value of palliative care.

primary_outcome.measure: safety and tolerability data of the study therapy
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: "Real life data" - clinical and / or serological (CA 125) response and Stable disease rates
secondary_outcome.time_frame: till one year after last date of Yondelis-PLD-therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with CR, PR, SD as best response
Time between first and last cycle of each patient

secondary_outcome.measure: Observation of the number of the therapy cycles applied

secondary_outcome.description: Date from last Yondelis-PLD-treatment to date of next treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: till one year after last date of Yondelis-PLD-therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Difference between date of first documentation of "PD" and the date of first Yondelis® + PLD application

secondary_outcome.time_frame: till one year after last date of Yondelis-PLD-therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Time in months from first assessment of CR or PR until the first date of PD or death.

arm_group.description: 30 mg/m² PLD i.v. followed by 1.1 mg/m² Yondelis® i.v. 3 h, q3weeks

study_pop.textblock: hospitales and medical practices in Germany

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women age >18, no upper limit
- Patients with relapsed platinum-sensitive ovarian cancer
- Before inclusion in the NIS written informed consent must be given
Exclusion Criteria:
- According to summary of product characteristics

overall_official.affiliation: Klinikum der Friedrich-Schiller-Universität Jena, Klinik für Frauenheilkunde, Bachstr. 18, D-07743 Jena

facility.name: Praxis und Tagesklinik für gynäkologische Onkologie
